Title: A new sound in the Dong village
Publisher: Guangxi renmin chubanshe (广西人民出版社)
Notes: Dong women standing along the railroad tracks, listening to the 'new sound' of a train coming. The Dong people (侗族) call themselves Kam, Dong is the official name given by the Chinese authorities. The Kam/Dong live in eastern Guizhou, western Hunan and northern Guangxi provinces.
